query: Could you arrange a week-long journey for two people beginning in Kansas City, during which we will visit three different cities in Texas starting from March 3rd to March 9th, 2022? We’ve set a budget of $7,700. For accommodations, we require non-shared rooms where smoking is allowed. Additionally, we prefer not to drive ourselves throughout this trip.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[San Antonio,Abilene,Dallas]
